column4: this is slightly OT... i'm trying to figure out how to enable quotas for my virtual users on one domain... it seems that their are two ways to do this, courier maildir quotas (bad option?) or the postfix vda patch.  could someone tell me more about the vda patch? (why isn't it part of standard postfix?)
yeah, there's just no activity there
yeah you usually have to wait a while to get an answer in there heh
